history.content:
Great way to use piazza! 

In case you haven't seen it, there's also a sample here: https://berkeley.app.box.com/v/lscs-sample-transfer-afterF17

Information about enrolling beyond 4 semesters can be found here: https://ls.berkeley.edu/advising/planning/enrolling/unit-ceiling. Notice that this requires being strategic with which units you enroll in. 

(Freshmen admits, please note that I think the above unit ceiling information has been adjusted to hold you to 4 years. Please contact L&S if you have questions about enrolling beyond 8 semesters)

(Freshmen admits, please note that I think the above unit ceiling information has been adjusted for you. Please contact L&S if you have questions about enrolling beyond 8 semesters)

history.content:
I've noticed people (including myself) have difficulty choosing course plan after transferring, especially for them who can't take summer edge and still have all lower division CS and EE classes to finish. Can anyone share their full course plans? The advising is not open yet but I'd like to know some references as well.

Also, do a lot of transfer students in CS L&S often graduate in 5 semesters?
history.subject: CS LS Transfer Course Plan
